alert.note: Alert for Pawnee; Rush; Stafford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 05 at 12:52AM CDT until June 05 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Pawnee County in south central Kansas... Stafford County in south central Kansas... Southeastern Rush County in central Kansas... * Until 130 AM CDT. * At 1251 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Olmitz to near Pawnee Rock to 7 miles northeast of Rozel, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Radium and Frizell around 110 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Larned, Seward, St. John, Macksville and Hudson. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
